subject: Baseball
Suits and Litigation
Ponzi and Pyramid Schemes
lead_paragraph: The judge could allow the trustee for Bernard L. Madoff’s victims to sue Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, or he could dismiss the case.
snippet: The judge could allow the trustee for Bernard L. Madoff’s victims to sue Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, or he could dismiss the case.
